üß† AgentDB Browser Examples

Self-Learning Client-Side Architectures with WASM

About These Examples

These examples demonstrate how to build self-learning AI systems entirely in the browser using AgentDB's WASM backend. Each architecture showcases different approaches to client-side machine learning, persistent memory, and adaptive behavior without requiring a server.

üöÄ AgentDB WASM üíæ LocalStorage Persistence üß† ReasoningBank ‚ö° Vector Search üéØ Self-Learning üì± 100% Client-Side
üìö

RAG Self-Learning

Retrieval-Augmented Generation that learns from user queries and feedback to improve responses over time.

  • Dynamic knowledge base growth
  • Query pattern learning
  • Feedback-based optimization
  • Semantic document retrieval

Pattern-Based Learning

Learn user interaction patterns and adapt behavior based on successful task completions.

  • User behavior tracking
  • Success pattern recognition
  • Adaptive UI/UX optimization
  • Predictive task assistance
Launch Demo

Experience Replay

Reinforcement learning-style architecture that stores experiences and learns optimal strategies.

  • Experience buffer management
  • Q-Learning implementation
  • Policy improvement over time
  • Reward-based optimization
Launch Demo

  • Preference vector learning
  • Cross-user pattern transfer

‚ö° Advanced & Exotic Examples

Explore cutting-edge AI concepts implemented entirely in the browser. These examples demonstrate futuristic architectures inspired by quantum computing, neuroscience, and advanced machine learning research.

üêù

Swarm Intelligence

Emergent collective behavior through particle swarm optimization, stigmergy, and pheromone trails.

  • Multi-agent coordination
  • Pheromone-based pathfinding
  • Emergent intelligence
  • Foraging & flocking behaviors
Launch Demo
üß†

Meta-Learning (MAML)

Learning to learn - rapidly adapt to new tasks with just a few examples using Model-Agnostic Meta-Learning.

  • Few-shot learning
  • Meta-parameter optimization
  • Rapid task adaptation
  • Inner/outer loop training
Launch Demo

Hybrid AI combining neural pattern recognition with symbolic logic for interpretable reasoning.

  • Neural + symbolic fusion
  • Logical rule inference
  • Explainable AI decisions

Quantum-Inspired Optimization

Global optimization using quantum computing principles: superposition, entanglement, and tunneling.

  • Quantum particle swarm
  • Superposition states
  • Tunneling through barriers
  • Entangled particles

üß¨

Continual Learning

Lifelong learning without catastrophic forgetting using Elastic Weight Consolidation and experience replay.

  • Sequential task learning
  • EWC regularization
  • Memory consolidation
  • Anti-forgetting mechanisms
Launch Demo

üîß Technical Features

All examples include:

  • ‚úì WASM-powered vector database running entirely in browser
  • ‚úì LocalStorage/IndexedDB persistence for offline capabilities
  • ‚úì ReasoningBank integration for pattern and experience management
  • ‚úì Real-time learning from user interactions
  • ‚úì Visual feedback showing learning progress
  • ‚úì Export/import functionality for data portability
  • ‚úì Zero backend requirements - fully client-side

Built with AgentDB v1.0.0 | GitHub
